typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		state_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> input
input pivot(groupBy(state_code),
	pivotBy(state_name),
	{} = sum(0),
	columnNaming: 'a$N$Vc',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(input(
		state_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
